鉤.definition: to hook; to sew; to crochet; hook; check mark or tick; window catch

鉤住.definition: to hook onto; to hitch onto; to catch onto

鉤嘴圓尾鸌.definition: (bird species of China) Tahiti petrel (Pseudobulweria rostrata)

鉤嘴林鵙.definition: (bird species of China) large woodshrike (Tephrodornis virgatus)

鉤心鬥角.definition: variant of 勾心鬥角|勾心斗角[gou1 xin1 dou4 jiao3]

鉤破.definition: (of sth sharp) to snag (one's stockings etc)

鉤稽.definition: to explore; to investigate; to audit (accounts, books etc)

鉤端螺旋體病.pinyin: gou1 duan1 luo2 xuan2 ti3 bing4
